schema.description:
要删除的交换机的地域ID。

您可以通过调用[DescribeRegions](~~36063~~)接口获取地域ID。

400.errorMessage: other subnet is processing.
vpc subnet is in middle status.
Resources deployed in the vSwitch have not been deleted.
Some route entry status blocked this operation.
VSwitch cannot be deleted when there are some HaVip dependent with it.
VSwitch cannot be deleted when associated with route table
Miss mandatory parameter.
The operation is too frequent, TaskConflict.
The vswitch cannot be deleted when used by snat.
Current CBN status does not support this operation.
The network acl and resource not in same vpc.
The resource has not been binded.
VSwitch cannot be deleted when snat entry exist.
VSwitch cannot be deleted when network acl exist.
VSwitch cannot be deleted when natgw exist.
VSwitch cannot be deleted when resource share exist.
Operation failed because system is busy.
VSwitch cannot be deleted when associated with multicast domain.
VSwitch cannot be deleted when vswitch cidr reservation exist.
VSwitch cannot be deleted when uesd by cloud service.
VSwitch not exist.
Operation failed because vswitch has ipv6 instance.
The specified resource of %s depends on %s, so the operation cannot be completed.

404.errorMessage: Specified instance is not found during access authentication.
Specified vSwtich instance is not found during access authentication.
VSwitch cannot be deleted when vswitch cidr reservation exist.
Specified object has dependent resources RouterInterface.

title: 删除交换机
description:
调用该接口删除交换机时，请注意以下事项： 

- 删除交换机之前，需要先释放或移走VPC内的所有资源，包括交换机、云产品实例、路由器接口、HaVip等。  

- 只有处于**Available**状态的交换机可以被删除。  

- 交换机所在的VPC正在创建或删除交换机或路由条目时，无法删除交换机。 

- **DeleteVSwitch**接口属于异步接口，即系统会返回一个请求ID，但该交换机尚未删除成功，系统后台的删除任务仍在进行。您可以调用[DescribeVSwitchAttributes](~~94567~~)查询交换机的删除状态：
    - 当交换机处于**Pending**状态时，表示交换机正在删除中。
    - 当查询不到指定的交换机时，表示交换机删除成功。

- **DeleteVSwitch**接口不支持并发删除同一个交换机。
